articles.author: Aya Wagatsuma
articles.title: Asian Stocks to Rise, Yen Steadies After Selloff: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg
articles.description: Most Asian shares gained, following their US peers higher, as investors positioned for a second Donald Trump presidency and an expected Federal Reserve interest-rate cut.
articles.content:
Most Asian shares gained, following their US peers higher, as investors positioned for a second Donald Trump presidency and an expected Federal Reserve interest-rate cut.
